description: First vm state is "shutoff", then I use "virsh start" to startup it. But the db info in nova still show "shutoff" not "active", it should be synced
title: vm state should sync after using 'virsh' command

comments.content: First vm state is "shutoff", then I use "virsh start" to startup it. But the db info in nova still show "shutoff" not "active", it should be synced
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mwjpiero

comments.content: There is a periodic task in nova compute _sync_power_states. It checks the hypervisor state and "syncs" the power state in DB.  So eventually the db info should match.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mandarvaze
